mapper.insert: insert into TEMPPET (ABNUMBER, MNUMBER, RESIDENCE, MARITALSTATUS, JOB, TEMPDATE, TEMPPERIOD) values (#{abNumber}, #{mNumber}, #{residence}, #{maritalStatus}, #{job}, SYSDATE, 2)
mapper.select: update TEMPPET set STATUS = '거절' where STATUS = '처리중' and ABNUMBER = (select T.ABNUMBER from TEMPPET T join ABANDONEDANIMAL AB on AB.ABNUMBER = T.ABNUMBER where T.TNUMBER = #{pk})
select * from ABANDONEDANIMAL where ABNUMBER not in (select ABNUMBER from TEMPPET where STATUS = '처리중') order by ABNUMBER
mapper.insert: insert into TEMPPET(ABNUMBER, MNUMBER, RESIDENCE, MARITALSTATUS, JOB, TEMPDATE, TEMPPERIOD, STATUS) values (#{abNumber}, #{mNumber}, #{residence}, #{maritalStatus}, #{job}, #{tempDate}, #{tempPeriod}, #{status})
mapper.update: update ABANDONEDANIMAL set ANIMALSTATE = '임보' where ABNUMBER in (select ABNUMBER from TEMPPET where STATUS = '완료')
